title: *POND BUILD* for Florida Alligator Farm (Rec Pond Revealed)

subtasks: Operator communicates with team to coordinate setup of equipment
Assembly and installation of filtration system components
Proper grounding and plumbing of pool filter into the pond
Excavation of the pond area considering depth and slope
Ensuring structural integrity of base before EPDM liner installation
Substrate layering and proper underlayment for EPDM protection
Installation of biofalls feature while maintaining water flow direction
Alignment and attachment of skimmer to the filtration system
Setting and positioning of EPDM liner with precise cutting and seam sealing
Integration of waterfalls and streams, ensuring structural supports
Planting and arranging natural elements like driftwood and logs for aesthetic and habitat creation
Visitor interaction for educational purposes, providing safety briefs near crocodiles
Task 2 - Construction of Patio
Excavation and preparation for patio site, considering waterproofing
Laying of patio bricks in alignment with existing features
Foundation work for the canopy structure over the patio
Final landscaping including hardscaping and irrigation setup
Supervision and hands-on teaching of newbies on proper installation techniques
Answering questions and troubleshooting issues during construction
Organizing social aspects of event such as team lunches and tours
Documentation including photo and video logging for marketing purposes
Approach the Alligator Farm safely without alarming crocodiles
Feeding schedule and types of baits used for the crocodiles
Observing crocodile behavior during and after feeding
Ensuring safety protocol is followed by the team while around alligators
